column1: #text=I got up early this morning and drove to the grocery store .
#text=I grabbed a shopping cart from outside and entered the store .
#text=Upon entering , I headed toward the bread aisle because I buy dried goods first .
#text=I filled my cart with a couple loaves of bread and a package of hamburger buns .
#text=After that , I proceeded to the beverage section and grabbed various sodas and sports drinks .
#text=Then , I moved on to the canned goods and grains .
#text=After throwing some cans of beans and bags of pasta into my cart , I went to the snack aisle .
#text=There , I took advantage of discounts on cookies , crackers , and potato chips .
#text=It was then time for the fruits and vegetables , of which I bought only a little .
#text=I only got tomatoes , bananas , and onions from this section .
#text=Next , I made my way to the meat section and purchased ground beef , pork chops , ham , and chicken breasts .
#text=Lastly , I hit the dairy aisle and grabbed a carton of milk and a gallon of ice cream .
#text=It was now time to find a register and pay for my groceries .
#text=After paying , I exited the store and put the groceries into my trunk .
#text=Then , I returned my shopping cart and drove home .
